alert.note: Alert for Elko; Lander; Nye; White Pine (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 14 at 10:53AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by rain and snowmelt is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central Nevada, north central Nevada and northeast Nevada, including the following counties, in central Nevada, Nye. In north central Nevada, Lander. In northeast Nevada, Elko and White Pine. * WHEN...Until 1100 PM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1050 AM PDT, Rain and snowmelt is causing minor flooding. Overflowing poor drainage areas have already caused minor flooding in the advisory area. - Rainfall amounts of 0.1 to 0.5 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Elko, Ely, Battle Mountain, Carlin, Wells, Ruby Lake, Jiggs, Lee, South Fork, Palisade, Spring Creek, Grass Valley and Emigrant Pass. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
